Synopsis

The Crown and the Dragon is an independently produced feature-length fantasy/adventure shot entirely on location in Ireland in the classic tradition - packed with action, romance, and a giant mythical beast bent on destruction. 

The story follows Elenn, an arrogant young noblewoman from the occupied land of Deira - a muddy backwater of the Vitalion Empire cursed by a particularly vicious dragon. Elenn accompanies her aunt on a mission to bring a relic to the secret coronation of the king of their people. When her aunt is murdered on the road by Vitalion soldiers, Elenn hires a smuggler and criminal, Aedin, to escort her across the dangerous country so she can take her auntÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s place at the coronation. But when Corvus, a rogue magister of the empire, employs a dark magic (Undead Assassins) to retrieve the ancient relic for his own evil designs, Elenn must find the humility and strength within herself to fulfill her auntÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s calling to free her people, and become a Paladin Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the long foretold dragonslayer.

Enjoy!
